title: Role Definition Schema
description: Schema for defining software development team roles

description.description: A comprehensive description of the role's purpose and main responsibilities

responsibilities.description: Key tasks and duties associated with the role

expertise.description: Technical skills and knowledge required for the role

tools_and_technologies.description: Essential and recommended tools and technologies for the role

characteristics.description: Personal qualities and soft skills needed for the role

interaction_with.description: Other roles this role typically collaborates with, including the nature of interaction

decision_authority.description: Areas where this role has final decision-making authority

scalability.description: How the role adapts in different team sizes

agile_mapping.description: How the role maps to Agile/Scrum frameworks and ceremonies

knowledge_sharing.description: Ways the role contributes to organizational knowledge

career_path.description: Potential career progression and skills to develop

remote_work_considerations.description: Guidelines for effective remote collaboration in this role

success_criteria.description: Metrics to evaluate performance in the role
